tool.name: SAGA.statistics_points.3
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False output_data_TABLE $output_data_TABLE name SAGA.statistics_points.3 POINTS $POINTS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TABLE $OutputSection_TABLE.outputType_TABLE transmissionMode_TABLE $OutputSection_TABLE.transmissionMode_TABLE

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TABLE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
